    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2610</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Uniform speed and the effect of acceleration and Decelaration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konstante Geschwindigkeit und der Effekt der 
Beschleunigung und des Decelaration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse uniforme et l'effet de l'accélération 
et du Decelaration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade uniforme e o efeito do acceleration e 
do Decelaration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità dell'uniforme e l'effetto di 
accelerazione e di Decelaration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομοιόμορφη ταχύτητα και η επίδραση της ταχύτητας και 
Decelaration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad uniforme y el efecto de la 
aceleración y de Decelaration</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A animation of a car traveling at different speeds and rates of acceleration.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation eines Autos, das mit 
unterschiedlichen Geschwindigkeiten und Kinetik der Beschleunigung 
reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation d'une voiture voyageant à 
différentes vitesses et cadences de l'accélération.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation de um carro que viaja em velocidades
e em taxas diferentes do acceleration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione di un automobile che viaggia alle 
velocità ed ai tassi differenti di accelerazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα ενός αυτοκινήτου που ταξιδεύει με τις 
διαφορετικά ταχύτητες και τα ποσοστά ταχύτητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación de un coche que viaja a las 
diversos velocidades e índices de la aceleración.</string>
